imports:
import SocialButton from "@kiwicom/orbit-components/lib/SocialButton";
import Stack from "@kiwicom/orbit-components/lib/Stack";
example:
() => (
  <Stack flex>
    <SocialButton size="small">Sign in with Apple </SocialButton>
    <SocialButton>Sign in with Apple </SocialButton>
    <SocialButton size="large">Sign in with Apple </SocialButton>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Sizes
info.description: Buttons come in three sizes: small, normal, and large.
